content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nowadays Canadian Tire account is in TOP 5 in EPAM with the number of Employees involved.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are more than 1090 Employees worldwide and more than 625 in Ukraine in range of offices across the country.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HISTORY OF COOPERATION\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our history together, how long are we working with this customer, how it all began and where we are now:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Canadian Tire started cooperation with EPAM in 2012. As an advantage of this cooperation, EPAM developed the digital transformation expertise, that helped us to become one of the world leaders in this field.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM experts made almost impossible, by presenting digital transformation for canadiantire.ca website.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First there were only 10 people on the project, now the account have developed up to 1200+ experts with broadened expertise.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In 2014 CTC became the largest account in EPAM, taking into consideration the number of employees involved.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":115778,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/11523fff-a5a2-49b5-ae85-d1ac26810f5e/Picture2.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/11523fff-a5a2-49b5-ae85-d1ac26810f5e/Picture2.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture2.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"11523fff-a5a2-49b5-ae85-d1ac26810f5e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":661,\"height\":372},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In 2015- 2016 EPAM helped Canadian Tire to transform business in online  direction and also get 60% increase in sales.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":163062,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a5243dc2-857f-45de-83c1-af43912098d5/Picture3.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a5243dc2-857f-45de-83c1-af43912098d5/Picture3.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"Picture3.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture3.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a5243dc2-857f-45de-83c1-af43912098d5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":645,\"height\":484},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After that the EPAM team had chance to develop the CTC product, which was named Point of sale. In 2017 it was sent to production after 8 months of development.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
